item.title: Server questions
item.dc:creator: @skitzo skitzo
item.description:
@skitzo wrote:

Hey i’ve got some questions about my server (just 2 actually)

ok first one is how do i make commands such as ::starter one use only? so far i have:

if (command.startsWith("starter") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995, 5000000); addItem(4278, 500000); addItem(556, 5000000); addItem(557, 5000000); addItem(558, 5000000); addItem(562, 5000000); addItem(566, 5000000); addItem(560, 5000000); addItem(561, 5000000); addItem(563, 5000000); addItem(555, 5000000); addItem(554, 5000000); addItem(559, 5000000); addItem(564, 5000000); }

second question is how do i make tele commands mod and above only (like for a staff area in this case) for that i have:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffarea")&& playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3107; sendMessage("You teleport to the staff area."); } }

please help?

Read full topic
